questions.text: How does CCE ensure policy neutrality?
options: By providing universal encryption algorithms
By aligning with a single operating system
By avoiding recommendations for specific configurations
By focusing on network protocols only
questions.correctAnswer: By avoiding recommendations for specific configurations

questions.text: CCE entries are most useful for which of the following tasks?
options: Developing network security protocols
Monitoring real time network traffic
Identifying software development bugs
Ensuring consistent policy configurations across systems
questions.correctAnswer: Ensuring consistent policy configurations across systems

options: Age of the vulnerability
The level of user awareness about the vulnerability
The inherent danger of the vulnerability
The cost of fixing a vulnerability
questions.correctAnswer: The inherent danger of the vulnerability

questions.text: How does CVSS help organizations prioritize vulnerabilities?
options: By giving software updates
By assigning severity score to vulnerabilities
By listing all known vulnerabilities
By identifying root cause of the vulnerabilities
questions.correctAnswer: By assigning severity score to vulnerabilities

questions.text: What is the main use of CCE in security management?
options: To enumerate configurable security controls in software
To document user activities
To map vulnerabilities to specific platform
To define encryption standards
questions.correctAnswer: To enumerate configurable security controls in software

questions.text: Why is CPE critical for inventory management in security systems?
options: It tracks user behavior inside the network
It provides standardized identifiers for software and hardware
It encrypts sensitive data in the inventory
It automatically fixes software vulnerabilities
questions.correctAnswer: It provides standardized identifiers for software and hardware

questions.text: Which CVSS component score is most likely to change as new information becomes available?
options: Temporal score
Base score
Environmental score
Overall score

questions.text: How does the CPE standard contribute to security automation?
options: By listing all possible software licenses
By defining network configurations
By standardizing the naming of hardware and software entities
It tracks user behavior in the network
questions.correctAnswer: By standardizing the naming of hardware and software entities

questions.text: How can SCAP's CVSS scoring system assist organizations in resource allocation?
options: By requiring equal resources for all vulnerabilities, regardless of severity.
By requiring manual scoring for each vulnerability.
By prioritizing vulnerabilities based on their severity and potential impact.
By focusing only on vulnerabilities with the lowest scores.
questions.correctAnswer: By prioritizing vulnerabilities based on their severity and potential impact.

questions.text: Which of the following best describes the purpose of CVE?
options: To manage encryption keys
To classify network protocols
To track software licensing
To enumerate software vulnerabilities
